p: A mixture of 3,3'-dichloro-4, 4'-dinitrobiphenyl (5 g, 0.0197 mol) and excess ammonia solution (100 ml), in methanol (100 ml) was charged into an autoclave and the whole mixture was heated at 100 °C for 3h. After the reaction was complete, methanol was removed by distillation and the amino product was precipitated. It was then filtered and washed with H 2O and dried. Yield 3.82 g (86.99%) m.p. 226 °C.
